sharebutton_button_tooltip.message: Share this page with friends using social networking services or email.

sharebutton_cant_share.message: This page can't be shared. It may be a secure page or a page not accessible to the public.

sharebutton_extension_description.message: Use the Share extension to share webpages via your social networks, email and blogs.

sharebutton_item_tooltip.message: Share this page with friends using $1

sharebutton_more_tooltip.message: Display more services in this menu

sharebutton_options_attribution.message: The Open Share Icon is available at http://www.openshareicons.com/ and is licensed under a Creative Commons license.

sharebutton_options_choose_text.message: Choose the services you'd like to have displayed in the menu.

sharebutton_options_tooltip.message: Display Options page where the extension can be configured

sharebutton_options_warning.message: Warning: Google Share Button displays up to $1 of the services you have selected.
